summary:
Due to \"justify\" The mod to be less cheating, I have Added 20% \"Tax\" / wasted material while crafting, It Makes Gold Crafting More expensive. And more Realistic, 
This mod is Compatible with ALL Official DLC`S and TES5 cleaned
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you Craft Septims from Gold Ingots And Melt Down Septims to Gold Ingots at the Smelter. The crafting and melting mod is in 4 levels, Craft 80, 800,1600 and 3200 Septims from Gold ingots, Or Melt down Septims to 1, 10, 20 and 40 Gold Ingots at the Smelter. With 20% Tax For the Empire. 
=========================================
To Craft GOLD You must have Gold Smithing perk: 
It will be achievable if you have Steel Smithing and ONE of those below: 
- lvl 50 Smithing 
- Golden Touch lvl 60 Lockpick 
- Cutpurse lvl 40 pickpocket 
- Merchant or Persuasion lvl 50 speak 
- Adept Alteration lvl 50 Alteration 
=========== 
*04.03.2013* 
Fixed the insane Smithingbuff. now you do not jump 13 levels or so to smith a iron dagger ;) Thank you \" TheOutlander\" for the info on the forum 
===================================
I HAVE NOT CHANGED THE VALUE OF THE INGOT OR THE ORE, ONLY THE COST ON CRAFTING THE GOLD :) 

This mod is Compatible with ALL Official DLC`S and TES5 cleaned

Due to \"justify\" The mod to be less cheating, I have Added 20% Tax / wasted material while crafting, It Makes Gold Crafting More expensive. And more Realistic, 
===========================================
*1 Gold Ingot Now Give 80 Septims Crafted 
*To Craft 1 Gold Ingot You need 120 Septims. 
* It costs 3 Gold Ore To make 1 Gold Ingot 
===========================================
( a tip: if you use my simultaneous meltdown mod, you can save some tax by making 5 or more Gold ingots simultaneous from ore) 

The smelting recipe will only show in menu if You got The Needed Materials to Craft, And the recipe disappear after the materials is used, and appears again when its needed. This is to keep the menu as clean as possible, The Ground Recipe Is always visible. (that 1 ingot thingy) 

The mod without the \"tax\" / wasted materials can be downloaded here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26453

Like the mod? Show some love and vote :) 

No need asking for permission to Translate this mod to other language. Just make a link to this original file. (and a little thanks on your site would be nice ;) )
author: KennyBall

To Craft You must have one of those Perks: - Advanced Armors lvl 50 Smith - Golden Touch lvl 60 Lockpick - Cutpurse lvl 40 pickpocket - Merchant or Persuasion lvl 50 speak - Adept Alteration lvl 50 Alteration
Fixed the perk issues, now you must have only one of them to craft
